mapper.select: select TASKID, ID, FAFANGSJ, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, PINZHONGM, ZHUOZHUANGHXM, JILIANGDW, SHULIANG, QISUANND, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, PINZHONG from bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZFFJL where TASKID = #{taskid}

select TASKID, ID, FAFANGSJ, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, PINZHONGM, ZHUOZHUANGHXM, JILIANGDW, SHULIANG, QISUANND, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, PINZHONG from bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZFFJL limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZFFJL(FAFANGSJ, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, PINZHONGM, ZHUOZHUANGHXM, JILIANGDW, SHULIANG, QISUANND, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, PINZHONG) values (#{fafangsj}, #{xingming}, #{junrenbzh}, #{pinzhongm}, #{zhuozhuanghxm}, #{jiliangdw}, #{shuliang}, #{qisuannd}, #{shujuszdw}, #{shangbaobz}, #{danweidm}, #{daorusj}, #{pinzhong})

insert ignore into bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZFFJL(ID, FAFANGSJ, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, PINZHONGM, ZHUOZHUANGHXM, JILIANGDW, SHULIANG, QISUANND, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, PINZHONG) values (#{id}, #{fafangsj}, #{xingming}, #{junrenbzh}, #{pinzhongm}, #{zhuozhuanghxm}, #{jiliangdw}, #{shuliang}, #{qisuannd}, #{shujuszdw}, #{shangbaobz}, #{danweidm}, #{daorusj}, #{pinzhong})
mapper.update:
update bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZFFJL
FAFANGSJ = #{fafangsj},
XINGMING = #{xingming},
JUNRENBZH = #{junrenbzh},
PINZHONGM = #{pinzhongm},
ZHUOZHUANGHXM = #{zhuozhuanghxm},
JILIANGDW = #{jiliangdw},
SHULIANG = #{shuliang},
QISUANND = #{qisuannd},
SHUJUSZDW = #{shujuszdw},
SHANGBAOBZ = #{shangbaobz},
DANWEIDM = #{danweidm},
DAORUSJ = #{daorusj},
PINZHONG = #{pinzhong},
where TASKID = #{taskid}
mapper.select: select ${field},count(1) c from bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZFFJL group by ${field}
